com.cyc.base.kbtool

Interface InferenceTool

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CycInferenceTool

    public interface InferenceTool
    Tools for performing inferences over the Cyc KB. To lookup facts in the Cyc KB, use the LookupTool.
    See Also:
    LookupTool

                          Object obj2)
                            throws CycConnectionException
        Determines whether the two input queries are equal EL expressions.
        Parameters:
        obj1 -
        obj2 -
        Returns:
        true if both input queries are equal
        Throws:
        java.io.CycConnectionException
        CycConnectionException

      • askCycQuery

        CycList askCycQuery(CycList query,
                  CycObject mt,
                  Object maxTransformationDepth,
                  Object maxNumber,
                  Object maxTimeSeconds,
                  Object maxProofDepth)
                    throws CycConnectionException,
                           CycConnectionException,
                           CycApiException
        Asks a Cyc query and returns the binding list. Properties:
        Parameters:
        query - the query expression
        mt - the inference microtheory
        maxTransformationDepth - the Integer maximum transformation depth or nil for no limit
        maxNumber - the Integer maximum number of returned bindings or nil for no limit
        maxTimeSeconds - the Integer maximum number of seconds inference duration or nil for no limit
        maxProofDepth - the Integer maximum number of levels in the proof tree or nil for no limit
        Returns:
        the binding list of answers for the given query and inference property settings
        Throws:
        CycConnectionException - if a communication error occurs
        CycConnectionException - if the Cyc server cannot be found
        CycApiException - if the Cyc server returns an error

      • destroyInferenceProblemStoreByName

        void destroyInferenceProblemStoreByName(String name)
                                        throws CycConnectionException,
                                               CycApiException
        Destroys the named problem store.
        Parameters:
        name - the unique problem store name
        Throws:
        CycConnectionException
        CycApiException

      • executeQuery

        InferenceResultSet executeQuery(CycList query,
                              CycObject mt,
                              InferenceParameters queryProperties,
                              long timeoutMsecs)
                                throws CycConnectionException,
                                       CycApiException,
                                       CycTimeOutException
        Run a synchronous query against Cyc.

        Note: One should put this call in a try/finally statement and the finally statement should explicitly close the result set. Failure to do so could cause garbage to accumulate on the server.
        Parameters:
        query - the query in CycList form to ask
        mt - the microtheory in which the query should be asked
        queryProperties - the query properties to use when asking the query
        timeoutMsecs - the amount of time in milliseconds to wait before giving up. A zero for this value means to wait forever.
        Returns:
        the InferenceResultSet which provides a convenient mechanism for walking over results similar to java.sql.ResultSet
        Throws:
        CycConnectionException - if a communication error occurs
        CycApiException - if an internal error occurs
        CycTimeOutException - if the query times out

      • executeQuery

        InferenceResultSet executeQuery(FormulaSentence query,
                              ELMt mt,
                              InferenceParameters queryProperties)
                                throws CycConnectionException,
                                       CycApiException,
                                       CycTimeOutException
        Run a synchronous query against Cyc.

        Note: One should put this call in a try/finally statement and the finally statement should explicitly close the result set. Failure to do so could cause garbage to accumulate on the server.
        Parameters:
        query - the query in FormulaSentence form to ask
        mt - the microtheory in which the query should be asked
        queryProperties - the query properties to use when asking the query
        Returns:
        the InferenceResultSet which provides a convenient mechanism for walking over results similar to java.sql.ResultSet
        Throws:
        CycConnectionException - if a communication error occurs
        CycApiException - if an internal error occurs
        CycTimeOutException - if the query times out

      • executeQuery

        InferenceResultSet executeQuery(FormulaSentence query,
                              ELMt mt,
                              InferenceParameters queryProperties,
                              long timeoutMsecs)
                                throws CycConnectionException,
                                       CycApiException,
                                       CycTimeOutException
        Run a synchronous query against Cyc.

        Note: One should put this call in a try/finally statement and the finally statement should explicitly close the result set. Failure to do so could cause garbage to accumulate on the server.
        Parameters:
        query - the query in FormulaSentence form to ask
        mt - the microtheory in which the query should be asked
        queryProperties - the query properties to use when asking the query
        timeoutMsecs - the amount of time in milliseconds to wait before giving up. A zero for this value means to wait forever.
        Returns:
        the InferenceResultSet which provides a convenient mechanism for walking over results similar to java.sql.ResultSet
        Throws:
        CycConnectionException - if a communication error occurs
        CycApiException - if an internal error occurs
        CycTimeOutException - if the query times out

      • executeQuery

        InferenceResultSet executeQuery(String query,
                              Object mt,
                              InferenceParameters queryProperties,
                              long timeoutMsecs)
                                throws CycConnectionException,
                                       CycApiException,
                                       CycTimeOutException
        Run a synchronous query against Cyc.

        Note: One should put this call in a try/finally statement and the finally statement should explicitly close the result set. Failure to do so could cause garbage to accumulate on the server.
        Parameters:
        query - the query in String form to ask
        mt - the microtheory in which the query should be asked (as a String, CycObject or ELMt)
        queryProperties - the query properties to use when asking the query
        timeoutMsecs - the amount of time in milliseconds to wait before giving up. A zero for this value means to wait forever.
        Returns:
        the InferenceResultSet which provides a convenient mechanism for walking over results similar to java.sql.ResultSet
        Throws:
        CycConnectionException - if a communication error occurs
        CycApiException - if an internal error occurs
        CycTimeOutException - if the query times out

        Returns a clone of the default HL query properties.
        Returns:
        the default HL query propoerties

                                        InferenceParameters queryProperties)
                                          throws CycConnectionException,
                                                 CycApiException
        Initializes a named inference problem store.
        Parameters:
        name - the unique problem store name
        queryProperties - the given query properties or null if the defaults are to be used
        Throws:
        CycConnectionException
        CycApiException

      • isQueryTrue

        boolean isQueryTrue(CycList query,
                  CycObject mt,
                  InferenceParameters queryProperties)
                    throws CycConnectionException,
                           CycConnectionException,
                           CycApiException
        Returns true if the Cyc query (with inference parameters) is proven true.
        Parameters:
        query - the query expression
        mt - the inference microtheory
        queryProperties - queryProperties the list of query property keywords and values, or null if the defaults are to used
        Returns:
        true if the query is proven true.
        Throws:
        CycConnectionException - if a communications error occurs
        CycConnectionException - if the Cyc server cannot be found
        CycApiException - if the Cyc server returns an error or if there are open variables in the query

      • isQueryTrue

        boolean isQueryTrue(FormulaSentence query,

                    throws CycConnectionException,
                           CycConnectionException,
                           CycApiException
        Returns true if the Cyc query (with inference parameters) is proven true.
        Parameters:

        mt - the inference microtheory
        queryProperties - queryProperties the list of query property keywords and values, or null if the defaults are to used

        Throws:
        CycConnectionException - if a communications error occurs
        CycConnectionException - if the Cyc server cannot be found
        CycApiException - if the Cyc server returns an error or if there are open variables in the query

      • isQueryTrue

        boolean isQueryTrue(CycList query,
                  CycObject mt,
                  InferenceParameters queryProperties,
                  long timeoutMsecs)
                    throws CycConnectionException,
                           CycConnectionException,
                           CycApiException
        Returns true if the Cyc query (with inference parameters) is proven true.
        Parameters:
        query - the query expression
        mt - the inference microtheory
        queryProperties - queryProperties the list of query property keywords and values, or null if the defaults are to used
        timeoutMsecs - the time in milliseconds to wait before giving up, set to zero in order to wait forever
        Returns:
        true if the query is proven true.
        Throws:
        CycConnectionException - if a communications error occurs
        CycConnectionException - if the Cyc server cannot be found
        CycApiException - if the Cyc server returns an error or if there are open variables in the query
        CycTimeOutException - if the calculation takes too long

        @Deprecated
boolean isQueryTrue(CycList query,
                             CycObject mt)
                    throws CycConnectionException,
                           CycConnectionException,
                           CycApiException
        Deprecated. 
        Returns true iff the query is true in the knowledge base.
        Parameters:
        query - the query to be asked in the knowledge base
        mt - the microtheory in which the query is asked
        Returns:
        true iff the query is true in the knowledge base
        Throws:
        CycConnectionException - if cyc server host not found on the network
        CycConnectionException - if a data communication error occurs
        CycApiException - if the api request results in a cyc server error

      • isQueryTrue_Cached

        @Deprecated
boolean isQueryTrue_Cached(CycList query,
                                    CycObject mt)
                           throws CycConnectionException,
                                  CycApiException
        Deprecated. 
        Returns true iff the query is true in the knowledge base, implements a cache to avoid asking the same question twice from the KB.
        Parameters:
        query - the query to be asked in the knowledge base
        mt - the microtheory in which the query is asked
        Returns:
        true iff the query is true in the knowledge base
        Throws:
        CycConnectionException - if a data communication error occurs
        CycApiException - if the api request results in a cyc server error

      • queryVariable

        CycList<Object> queryVariable(CycVariable variable,
                            CycList query,
                            CycObject mt,
                            InferenceParameters queryProperties)
                              throws CycConnectionException,
                                     CycConnectionException,
                                     CycApiException
        Asks a Cyc query (new inference parameters) and returns the binding list for the given variable.
        Parameters:
        variable - the unbound variable for which bindings are sought
        query - the query expression
        mt - the inference microtheory
        queryProperties - queryProperties the list of query property keywords and values, or null if the defaults are to used
        Returns:
        the binding list resulting from the given query
        Throws:
        CycConnectionException - if a communications error occurs
        CycConnectionException - if the Cyc server cannot be found
        CycApiException - if the Cyc server returns an error

      • queryVariable

        CycList<Object> queryVariable(CycVariable queryVariable,
                            String query,
                            Object mt,
                            InferenceParameters queryProperties,
                            long timeoutMsecs)
                              throws CycConnectionException,
                                     CycConnectionException,
                                     CycApiException
        Asks a Cyc query (new inference parameters) and returns the binding list for the given variable.
        Parameters:
        queryVariable - the unbound variable for which bindings are sought
        query - the query expression
        mt - the inference microtheory (given in String, CycObject or ELMt form)
        queryProperties - queryProperties the list of query property keywords and values, or null if the defaults are to used
        Returns:
        the binding list resulting from the given query
        Throws:
        CycConnectionException - if a communications error occurs
        CycConnectionException - if the Cyc server cannot be found
        CycApiException - if the Cyc server returns an error

      • queryVariable

        CycList<Object> queryVariable(CycVariable variable,
                            CycList query,
                            CycObject mt,
                            InferenceParameters queryProperties,
                            long timeoutMsecs)
                              throws CycConnectionException,
                                     CycConnectionException,
                                     CycApiException,
                                     CycTimeOutException
        Asks a Cyc query (new inference parameters) and returns the binding list for the given variable.
        Parameters:
        variable - the unbound variable for which bindings are sought
        query - the query expression
        mt - the inference microtheory
        queryProperties - queryProperties the list of query property keywords and values, or null if the defaults are to used
        timeoutMsecs - the amount of time in milliseconds to wait before giving up, set to zero in order to wait forever.
        Returns:
        the binding list resulting from the given query
        Throws:
        CycConnectionException - if a communications error occurs
        CycConnectionException - if the Cyc server cannot be found
        CycApiException - if the Cyc server returns an error
        CycTimeOutException - if the calculation takes too long

                    CycList query,
                    CycObject mt,
                    InferenceParameters queryProperties,
                    String inferenceProblemStoreName)
                      throws CycConnectionException,
                             CycConnectionException,
                             CycApiException
        Asks a Cyc query (new inference parameters) and returns the binding list for the given variable.
        Parameters:
        variable - the unbound variable for which bindings are sought
        query - the query expression
        mt - the inference microtheory
        queryProperties - queryProperties the list of query property keywords and values, or null if the defaults are to used
        inferenceProblemStoreName - the problem store name
        Returns:
        the binding list resulting from the given query
        Throws:

        CycConnectionException - if the Cyc server cannot be found
        CycApiException - if the Cyc server returns an error

      • queryVariable

        CycList queryVariable(CycList query,
                    CycVariable variable,
                    CycObject mt)
                      throws CycConnectionException,
                             CycConnectionException,
                             CycApiException
        Returns a list of bindings for a query with a single unbound variable.
        Parameters:
        query - the query to be asked in the knowledge base
        variable - the single unbound variable in the query for which bindings are sought
        mt - the microtheory in which the query is asked
        Returns:
        a list of bindings for the query
        Throws:
        CycConnectionException - if cyc server host not found on the network
        CycConnectionException - if a data communication error occurs
        CycApiException - if the api request results in a cyc server error

                              CycConnectionException,
                              CycApiException
        Asks a Cyc query (new inference parameters) and returns the binding list for the given variable list.
        Parameters:
        queryVariables - the list of unbound variables for which bindings are sought
        query - the query expression
        mt - the inference microtheory
        queryProperties - queryProperties the list of query property keywords and values, or null if the defaults are to be used
        inferenceProblemStoreName - the problem store name
        Returns:
        the binding list resulting from the given query
        Throws:
        CycConnectionException - if a communications error occurs
        CycConnectionException - if the Cyc server cannot be found
        CycApiException - if the Cyc server returns an error
